ProcedurePlanOption.name: ProcedurePlanOption
ProcedurePlanOption.description: Represents the selection criteria of how a procedure can be configured for a selected procedure plan section record.

ApexClassId.description: The Apex class associated with the procedure plan option record.

ApexClassName.description: The name of the Apex class associated with the procedure plan option record.

CriteriaLogic.description: The computation logic for the various conditions applied to an option.

CtxDefinitionOutputFieldId.description: The context definition field that’s associated with the decision table.

CtxMappingOutputFieldId.description: The context mapping field that’s associated with the decision table.

DecisionTableId.description: The decision table associated with the pricing procedure.

ExpressionSetApiName.description: The API name of the expression set.

ExpressionSetDefinitionId.description: The expression set definition associated with the procedure plan option record.

ExpressionSetLabel.description: The label of the expression set definition.

ExpressionSetOutputFieldId.description: The expression set output field that’s associated with the decision table.

PrimaryObject.description: The procedure plan definition associated with the procedure plan option record.

Priority.description: The order in which the options are executed.

ProcedurePlanSectionId.description: The procedure plan section associated with the procedure plan option record.

ReadContextMapping.description: The read context mapping used to read from the mapped object and populate the context definition.

SaveContextMapping.description: The save context mapping used to save from the context definition and populate the mapped object.
